entry.title: Bitcoin Assistance
entry.summary: On September 27, 2017, Tim Ruffing raised concerns on the bitcoin-dev mailing list about possible violations of CC BY-SA license in the old version of some icons listed as "License: MIT". This issue was addressed by the copyright holder who made changes to the licensing of the icons. The commit for the changes can be found on GitHub and it is recommended to use the "git log -p" command to locate specific changes in a file.
